entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -1.6°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
